resources.title: Drug Identifier
resources.description: Have questions about what your medication looks like? Did you get a different manufacturer? Check to make sure!

resources.title: What if I miss a dose of my medication?
resources.description: Should I take it now? Learn the basics, but always ask your doctor or pharmacist if you have any questions!

resources.title: Latest Information on Drug Approvals and Safety
resources.description: Questions about medications just coming to market or other drug-related topics? See patient friendly information regarding drug approvals

resources.title: Popular Drug Topics and Cost Saving Resources for Medications
resources.description: Get trusted and reliable answers to cost savings and various health and wellness questions

resources.title: Know Your OTC Meds
resources.description: Downloadable, multilingual information for families regarding how to take OTC medications safely and how to safely give them to your little ones

resources.title: Medications, Herbs, and Supplements
resources.description: Questions about how herbs and supplements are affecting your prescription medications?

resources.title: Proper Disposal of Medications
resources.description: Information regarding proper and safe disposal of medications

resources.title: FDA Info on Proper Disposal of Medications
resources.description: Information on National Drug Take Back Day

resources.title: Aging and Medications
resources.description: How medications affect our bodies change as we age. Find out more.

resources.title: How to Safely Take Medications As We Age
resources.description: Information on how to maximize benefits and reduce risks of meidcations
